Row.Text: [ICON_BULLET]Halved movement cost in Tundra and Snow.
[ICON_BULLET]No combat penalty for attacking across a river.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+25% [ICON_STRENGTH] Strength in Marsh.
[ICON_BULLET]No combat penalty for attacking from water.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Halved movement cost in Marsh.
[ICON_BULLET]+10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Strength and +2 healing in friendly territory.
[ICON_BULLET]+15% [ICON_STRENGTH] Strength and +3 healing in friendly territory.
